channel.title: Vps
channel.description:
I am going to buy a VPS for 24/7 uptime, but i really don't know how these things work.
I am going to pay from www.vpscity.nl/ (i can't buy from www.vpsland.com etc. because i have to pay via iDeal/Moneybookers).
It has:
Centos 5.4 64 bit Remote Desktop Small - CentOS 5.4 64 bit
Desktop specs
10Gb HDD 256Mb memory 100Gb bandwith
Installed applications
* KDE Desktop * RealVNC * OpenOffice * Firefox * Kopete
Possible to install own applications! Own remote desktop! Everytime online!
After i purchased this, what the heck do i have to do? And is 10GB HDD good for around the 10-20 players?

item.title: Vps
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“getstabbed, post:6, topic:353243”]It doesn’t matter about how much HD space there is, it all depends on the ram.
256mb of ram will get you up to 10 players without lag.
You’d be better off hosting yourself.[/quote]No, CentOS uses less RAM then windows also this would hold atleast 20 players.
You use Windows Remote Control (for windows) to connect to your VPS, for more information read this guide.

Read full topic

item.description:
@getstabbed wrote:

item.title: Vps
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

Shadowspkin:

You wait 24 hours… Then they send you the info… You login to it VIA Remote desktop and you upload your source from your comp and download it on the vps then download no-ip login and wallaa … (Above post is spam)

Oh, so i still use No-IP for people to connect? But then what are the Name servers of No-IP?

Read full topic

item.title: Vps

item.description:
@claunchii wrote:

No it is not, I simply told him to look at a VPS guide so he will know what he’s doing so some moron like you will tell him some BS and him waste his money. Thats obviously what he wants.

item.title: Vps
item.dc:creator: @claunchii claunchii
item.description:
@claunchii wrote:

I’d suggest looking at a VPS guide i know theres one on here under server tutorials. 10GB should hold 40-50 if not more without lag.

Read full topic
